recipe.title: Grilled Rib-Eye Steaks with Parsley-Garlic Butter
ingredients: For the Parsley-Garlic Butter, mix together in small bowl, then cover and chill:
Prepare barbecue (medium-high heat). Rub with generous amounts of salt and pepper:
instructions: Grill steaks to desired doneness, about 6 minutes per side for medium-rare. Cut each steak in half, top with spoonful of chilled butter, and serve.
